info.name: Wanikani - Clean Dashboard
info.description: Removes a lot of unnecessary items from the WK dashboard. I really like one-page website, so depending on your resolution (made on 24" screen) and whether or not you use rfindley's timeline, this will achieve one.
info.additionalInfo:

v1.0

 - Removed (in my opinion) useless 'new items', 'critical items' and 'burned items'
 - Removed items under progress bar
 - Removed text under SRS item count
